title: I cant play league of legends(its not network issues)
body:
okay this is my second post on this....because it didnt fix anything,okay so as you see on the video i click exit and yes and it doesnt do anything,i tried to log in but its just stuck on authenticating and it hasnt moved for the last 1 hour....i tried to open the menu didnt work,its not only the login screen,sometimes it will work and i could get in to the lobby and because i have left some games cuz i am stupid i have to wait 10 minutes....so it would go to until like 7 or any random minute left and then freeze....i click leave lobby,it works but the number in top right still stays..when i go into profile or whatever i click it doesnt load, or when i click the x thing on the number in the top right...it doesnt close and i cant play...
what i have tried:
1.reinstalling the game(about 5 times maybe)
2.full repair
3.port forwarding or power cycle.... didnt work
please help i cant play league of legends for couple days and its not my network i dont have network issues...if i do someone send me a video how to fix this sh**

replies.body:
Were you able to try the steps Porocles mentioned in your previous post at all? I wasn't able to see the video you linked for some reason (says unavailable), but the way you describe makes it sound very similar to most connection based issues. It doesn't mean your internet isn't working, but it's not uncommon at all for someone's network to reach some servers and have a hard time hitting others (most often due to routing issues). 

Be sure to also check out your firewalls/antivirus settings as well, or just try turning them off completely while you're trying to login. Sometimes those can block your network from reaching our servers, and this would be my next troubleshooting step if port forwarding isn't working. Check out your antivirus and firewalls settings for me really quick with [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3), but if those don't help be sure to hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Send them your League Logs [which you can create with the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool)] and they can take a closer look that way.
how long will it take for them to look into it?and can you see the video now?
